Authors: Deng Wangqiu, Li Taihui, Li Peng, Yang Zhuliang
Title:
A new species of Amanita section Lepidella from South
China
Abstract:
Amanita macrocarpa is described from Guangdong of China.
The new species is a large, brownish orange to light brown mushroom,
characterized by many pyramidal warts on pileus, yellowish lamellae,
large annulus at the middle stipe, and amyloid ellipsoid basidiospores.
Phylogenetic analyses were provided based on LSU and ITS sequences of
the new species and related taxa. Morphological and molecular analyses
show that A. macrocarpa is a member of Amanita section Lepidella and
clearly different from any known taxon of the section.
